channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In 2022, the name 'monkeypox' was rejected as inapt. Now the U.S. is reviving it
item.description: The World Health Organization nixed the name "monkeypox." The virus is spread by rodents and small mammals. And there's a stigma factor. Mpox took its...

item.title: South Africa reopens inquest into death of Steve Biko
item.description: South Africa has reopened the investigation into the death of anti-apartheid leader Steve Biko — 48 years after he was killed in police custody.

item.title: What MAGA Lost When It Lost Charlie Kirk
item.description: His death makes it harder to look ahead and glimpse what MAGA will stand for.

item.title: Rare but Serious Complication Shows Flu’s Potential Harm
item.description: Acute necrotizing encephalopathy, or A.N.E., can result from influenza or other infections, including Covid-19.
